name: Monsteria (itch)
description:
Introducing a hysterical top-down shooter. Challenge your way through 7 randomized levels, brimming with hordes of bizarre monsters. Upgrade your character through a selection of 30 unique powerups and minions. Unlock special classes and much much more.


Features:

  • 20 gimmicky powerups and endless combinations
  • 30+ bizarre types of monsters to fight
  • 30+ unique levels
  • 4 special unlockable characters
  • Smart AI programmed into monsters to create challenging and exhilarating gameplay
  • Input seeds for level and upgrade randomization
  • Compatible on all platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux
